data.title: Ana Pires on LinkedIn: On April 3, the "Girls in ICT Day" was celebrated at Agrupamento de…
data.meta_description: On April 3, the "Girls in ICT Day" was celebrated at Agrupamento de Escolas Dr. José Domingues dos Santos (Lavra)! A wonderful morning under the framework of…
data.text: ¡El cielo no es el límite!🚀✨ Estoy emocionada de compartir con todos ustedes que he recibido mi Carta de Aceptación para participar en Project PoSSUM (Polar Suborbital Science in the Upper Mesosphere) del International Institute for Astronautical Sciences (IIAS) en EE.UU., apoyado por flight opportunities de la NASA y que da inicio a mi preparación en el área espacial como futuro candidato Scientist-Astronaut. Agradezco primero a Dios, además de mis padres que apoyaron todas mis decisiones personales, académicas y profesionales. Asimismo, gracias a Ana Pires por inspirarme, su gran paciencia y consejo todo este tiempo. Me emociona saber que seré parte de esta nueva familia y seguiré los pasos de grandes mujeres como: ▪️ Ana Pires ▪️ Katya Echazarreta ▪️ Kellie Gerardi ▪️ Shawna Pandya ▪️ Amanda Nguyen Y muchas más. Espero inspirar a más personas, latinos y chilenos tanto como ellas lo hacen en mí. ¡Vamos al espacio! ¡Ya lo verás! 👩🚀🚀 Job 8:7.🌌💫 ------------------------------- The sky is not the limit!🚀✨ I am excited to share with all of you that I have received my Letter of Acceptance to participate in Project PoSSUM (Polar Suborbital Science in the Upper Mesosphere) of the International Institute for Astronautical Science (IIAS) in the USA, supported by flight opportunities from NASA and that begins my preparation in the space area as a future Scientist-Astronaut candidate. I thank God first, in addition to my parents who supported all my personal, academic and professional decisions. Also, thanks to Ana Pires for inspiring me, her great patience and advice all this time. I am excited to know that I will be part of this new family and will follow in the footsteps of great women like: ▪️ Ana Pires ▪️ Katya Echazarreta ▪️ Kellie Gerardi ▪️ Shawna Pandya ▪️ Amanda Nguyen And many more. I hope to inspire more people, Latinos and Chileans as much as they do in me. Let's go to space! You will see! 👩🚀 🚀 Job 8:7.🌌💫 #IIAS #STEM #Mujeresqueinspiran #Ingenieria #Geologia #Geotecnia #Chile #Space #Civil #NASA
